description: Documentation for 9.7.16.6.2.1. Implicitly pipelined tcgen05 Instructions

files.title: Overview
files.summary: Instructions `tcgen05.commit` and `tcgen05.wait` are implicitly pipelined with respect to previously issued `tcgen05.{mma,cp,shift}` and `tcgen05.{ld,st}` instructions respectively that they track from the same thread.

files.title: tcgen05-memory-consistency-model-mbarrier-completion
files.summary: Completion of the following instruction’s asynchronous operations is observed through the mbarrier based waiting mechanism:

files.title: tcgen05-memory-consistency-model-wait-completion
files.summary: Completion of the following instruction’s asynchronous operations is observed through `tcgen05.wait` based waiting mechanism:
